name: Infinite Passengers
description:
Infinite Passengers adds the elements of airline fleet, passenger satisfaction and pilot skills to Infinite Flight.

Here are just a few of the current features:
-Test your piloting skills

- Connect to Infinite Flight and get a report on the professionalism of your flight

- Monitors air speed, taxi speed, bank angles, g-forces and more

-Added boarding music and safety announcements. As further in app purchase you can have airline specific choices.

-Create virtual airline, purchase aircraft, hire or fire pilots in multiplayer

-Add passengers to your flights. The better you fly the higher your airline rating and the more passengers and income you receive.

Check out these videos: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_wJXO_zW6cezysc1XA04aQ
